content: Introduction:

tag: html body text p strong span
content: AHLUL- BAYT Islamic Centre, commonly known as HUSSIANIA is a purpose built

tag: html body text p strong span
content: NATIONAL IRISH SHI’A MUSLIM ISLAMIC CENTRE. It is the only Shi’a Muslim

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Islamic centre in Ireland including the Northern Ireland. Its aims and objectives are to

tag: html body text p strong span
content: serve the social , cultural and spritual needs of the entire Shi’a Muslim populationof

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Ireland. There are about 1000 Shi’a Muslims working, studying and living in Ireland.

tag: html body text p font big u span
content: Historical Background:

tag: html body text p strong span
content: The foundation of HUSSIANIA was laid down some time during the 1970’s by afew Shi’a

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Muslim medical students, who came to Dublin from the Middle Eastern countries to study

tag: html body text p strong span
content: at the Royal College of surgeon, Dublin. These students hired a small house in the

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Portobello area of Dublin and then after a few years when this place was not big enough to

tag: html body text p strong span
content: accommodate every one, they moved to a bigger house in Rathgar. Gradually this place

tag: html body text p strong span
content: become known to other Shi'a Muslims living and working in Ireland. After a few years

tag: html body text p strong span
content: later even this house was not big enough to cater for the religious and spiritual needs of

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Irish Shi'a Muslim community. It was time to find a bigger and better space to serve

tag: html body text p strong span
content: properly the socio-cultural and religious needs of this small but growing Shi'a Muslim

tag: html body text p strong span
content: community of Ireland. During the 1990’s the local Irish Shi'a Muslim communitydecided

tag: html body text p strong span
content: to build a proper Shi'a Muslim Islamic Center. They tapped on their own resources and

tag: html body text p strong span
content: constructed a purpose built center in the Milltown area of Dublin 14. Hussainia, Ahlul

tag: html body text p strong span
content: -Bait Shi'a Islamic Center was officially opened in September 1996.

tag: html body text p strong span
content: A full time resident Imam- Sayyed Ali Abdullah decided to return to Ireland in order to

tag: html body text p strong span
content: assume his official duty as a religious head of this center. He is a noble and qualifiedShi’a

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Muslim religious scholar from the highest Muslim academic institution of Qum, Iran

tag: html body text p strong span
content: (known as Hawza ).

tag: html body text p strong span
content: The Imam of this Hussainia is not only responsible for the Islamic needs of the Shi'a

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Muslim community of Ireland but also anyone interested in the religion of Islam and

tag: html body text p strong span
content: Islamic world.
